Ping.name: Ping
Ping.desc: Shows the ping of the user.

Version.name: Version
Version.desc: Displays the current version of the bot

Repository.name: Repository
Repository.desc: Displays the current repository of the bot

Deletemsg.name: Deletemsg
Deletemsg.desc: Sets the delete condition of wilderness channels

Bc.name: Bc
Bc.desc: Broadcasts a message, only works in broadcast channel

Verify.name: Verify
Verify.desc: Verifies the user and gives 50 points

Sp.name: Sp
Sp.desc: Shows the points and rank of the user or other user specified

Point.name: Point
Point.desc: Does various functions on points of users

Prefix-set.name: Prefix-set
Prefix-set.desc: Sets the prefix of the bot

Ss.name: Ss
Ss.desc: Sends a screenshot of the spleef map mentioned

Ban-word.name: Ban-word
Ban-word.desc: Does function on the banned words

Report.name: Report
Report.desc: Reports your message to the owner

Levelup.name: Levelup
Levelup.desc: Levels up the user when he/she has the required amount of points

Sendfile.name: Sendfile
Sendfile.desc: Sends one of the system files to the user
